definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: They consist of electrochemical devices, including one or even more galvanic cells.
sentences.chinese: 它们包括电化学设备，包括一个或更多的电流细胞。

sentences.english: In this review the emphasis will be placed on the electrochemical reactivity of synthetic metalloporphyrin complex in nonaqueous media.
sentences.chinese: 本文概述在非水介质中合成金属卟啉络合物的电化学。

sentences.english: Evaluated of hydrogen uptake and permeation in Zinc-Nickel alloy and metals by an electrochemical technique.
sentences.chinese: 电化学渗透方法能够实地监控和评价镀层的氢脆性能。

sentences.english: The other two processes are electrochemical machining (ECM) and electrolytic grinding.
sentences.chinese: 另两种工艺就是电化学加工和电解磨削。

sentences.english: In this paper the application in chlor-alkali and electrochemical synthesis will be introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文将着重介绍氯碱电解及电化学合成中的应用。

sentences.english: The resulting composite film was applied to entrap tyrosinase for fabricating phenol biosensor.
sentences.chinese: 用此杂化膜包埋酪氨酸酶，制备电化学苯酚传感器。

sentences.english: So, I'm interested in nonaqueous electrochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 我对非水溶剂电化学感兴趣。

sentences.english: A new method for 1,1'-dithiodiformamidine prepared by the electrooxidation of thiourea is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了用硫脲电化学制备二硫甲脒的新方法。

sentences.english: Objective To research the possibility of liver hemangioma treated with electrochemical therapy ( EchT) .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究电化学疗法治疗肝血管瘤的可能性。

sentences.english: Inquiring methods of electrochemistry information on internet and their results are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国际互联网上的电化学信息的查询方法和结果。

sentences.english: The polarization curves and AC impedance of the coatings were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 采用电化学技术测试镀层的极化曲线和交流阻抗。

sentences.english: The application of cyclic voltammetry in the preparation of electrochemical sensors was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了循环伏安法在电化学传感器制备中的应用。

sentences.english: The mechanical behaviors and electrochemical properties of Pb-Ca-Sn-Al-Re alloy were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了稀土铅钙锡铝合金的力学性能和电化学性能。

sentences.english: Graphite was oxidized and exfoliated in ammonia medium by applying electrochemical oxidization.
sentences.chinese: 利用电化学氧化，在氨介质中将石墨氧化剥离。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate treatment of the bleeding and prolapse of hemorrhoids by copper ion electrochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 目的利用铜离子电化学疗法治疗痔出血及痔脱出。
